stories.text:
Hello! I am creating an app that helps you organize your thoughts and understand yourself to live a happier life. Anima guides you through a review of your thoughts, feelings, habits and relationships with others. Anima also allows you to set meaningful goals.

I would appreciate your feedback on the prototype. You can try it for free:

https://anyma.bubbleapps.io

I am a psychologist and neuroscientist. I graduated with a Masterâ€™s degree from University College London, where I analysed brain scans, created mathematical models of decision making and used brain stimulation to modulate human learning. I always wanted to create a digital model of the individual and I hope that Anima will grow closer to this vision in the future.

I would really appreciate your feedback on how to develop the product further and create value for you.
stories.title: I am creating a tool for organizing your thoughts and understanding yourself
